original_text: And all the army of the Chaldees, that were with the captain of the guard, brake down the walls of Jerusalem round about.
korean_text: 시위대장에게 속한 갈대아 온 군대가 예루살렘 주위의 성벽을 헐었으며

sentences.original_text: And all the army of the Chaldees
that were with the captain of the guard
brake down the walls of Jerusalem
